name: Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque Visit
description: Explore the Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque in Istanbul, iconic symbols of the city's rich history, offering stunning architectural beauty.

name: Cappadocia Hot Air Balloon Ride
description: Experience a hot air balloon ride over Cappadocia, known for its unique fairy chimneys, rock formations, and breathtaking landscapes.

name: Ephesus Ancient City Tour
description: Discover the ancient city of Ephesus, one of the largest Roman archaeological sites in the eastern Mediterranean.

name: Pamukkale Thermal Pools
description: Visit the Pamukkale thermal pools, famous for their terraces of carbonate minerals and therapeutic waters.

name: Topkapi Palace Exploration
description: Explore Topkapi Palace in Istanbul, the primary residence of the Ottoman sultans for nearly 400 years, showcasing opulent courtyards and rich exhibits.

name: Grand Bazaar Shopping Experience
description: Shop at Istanbul's Grand Bazaar, one of the largest and oldest covered markets in the world, offering a variety of traditional goods and souvenirs.

name: Antalya Old Town and Beaches
description: Enjoy the historic Old Town of Antalya, Kaleiçi, and relax on the beautiful beaches along the Turkish Riviera.

name: Sumela Monastery Visit
description: Discover the Sumela Monastery, a stunning Greek Orthodox monastery perched on a cliff in the Maçka district of Trabzon.

name: Göbekli Tepe Archaeological Site
description: Visit Göbekli Tepe, one of the world's oldest temple complexes, offering insights into early human settlements and civilizations.

name: Mount Nemrut Sunrise or Sunset Tour
description: Witness a breathtaking sunrise or sunset at Mount Nemrut, known for its giant head statues and a UNESCO World Heritage site.
